vote.title: Authorize the (1) termination of that certain lease of land and facilities at Dallas Love Field between the City of Dallas and Associated Air Center, Inc., dated December 1, 1993, as amended and assigned to Regal Assets, LLC, and upon termination of the lease, approximately 373,083 square feet of land with the existing facilities shall be annexed into the Consolidated Lease of Land and Facilities with Regal Assets, LLC; and (2) First Amendment to the Consolidated Lease of Land and Facilities with Regal Assets, LLC, dated April 1, 2019 to add an additional ten years to the primary term of the lease and an additional ten-year renewal option in consideration of increasing Regal Assets’ existing capital investment commitment by an additional $2,000,000.00 and including an additional rental payment of $1,500,000.00 to the City - Estimated Revenue: Aviation Fund $52,340,449.75 additional rent during the primary term of the lease
